ygData.subject: Prepare for another nerf... =8^P
ygData.msgSnippet: Looks like we re going to get nerfed again...  Here s a quote I just got off Everlore about today s patch...  OK, granted it s not just a nerf to us, but all
ygData.messageBody:
Looks like we're going to get nerfed again... Here's a quote I just got off
Everlore about today's patch... OK, granted it's not just a nerf to us, but
all the "battle bards" will definitely be affected by it... Now watch as
they make it so that ONLY bards using haste songs and FBSS's will fight
SLOWER...

Abashi:
In any case, I doubt that it will be as valuable after tomorrow. We found a
bug with the way "haste" items stack with "haste" spells. Basically, even
the worst haste item combined with the worst haste spell would put the
wearer at the haste cap. This basically invalidated the better haste items
and spells, and explains why people have been saying that the newer haste
items aren't any better than the FBSS.

This is being fixed in tomorrow's patch.


Olgwinn Pendragun
Bard of 45 Missed Notes
E'ci
